This website was build for share information about programming and statistics in agricultural and biological areas using free and open source softwares.

# Softwares used for develop

- [R](https://cran.rstudio.com/)
- [R Studio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/)
- [Github desktop](https://desktop.github.com/)
- [Mendely](https://www.mendeley.com/)

# Projects

## GerminaR package

GerminaR is a R package development for study the germination process for ecophysiological, agronomic and biological studies. This package has their interactive app (build with shiny) **GerminaQuant for R** for statistical and graphic analysis of germination.


## Quipu 2.0 (*in progress*)

Quipu 2.0 is a book base in experience with data manipulation, collection and analisys with R and using others free softwares. Thise book will be write en spanish, because there are a many people interest in learn R but a lot the information is in english, so these book pretend help these persons.


## Elisios (*in progress*)

Elisios is a web application develop for calculate the water requirements for crops according the weater information. Elisios will have the possibility to conect at metereological estation based in arduino.
